title: [BUG] SKTypeface.UnitsPerEm throws System.ExecutionEngineException when created from a file
body:
### Description

When I create an SKTypeface using FromFile, accessing UnitsPerEm throws System.ExecutionEngineException
.
```
SKTypeface typeface = SKTypeface.FromFile(_file.FullName);
int units = typeface.UnitsPerEm; // throws.
```

In contrast, when I create an SKTypeface from a stream to the same file, UnitsPerEm does not throw.
```
using (Stream stream = _file.OpenRead())
{
    if (stream.Length > 0)
    {
        SKTypeface typeface = SKTypeface.FromStream(stream);
        int units = typeface.UnitsPerem; // returns a valid value.
        ...
    }
}

I'm using SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls v3.116.1
